title: [1.8-1.7.10][已弃更][Weird Things Mod——怪异的东西][授权搬运]
author: yuudachi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 yuudachi 于 2019-7-15 09:47 编辑 

停更告知因该MOD官方长时间未更新，本帖从即日起停止更新，并不再进行维护。2017.07.24
使用前须知目前该MOD仅为Beta版，可能（其实是实际）会出现很多的Bug，所以请不要轻易的在重要的游戏存档当中使用或使用之前备份好存档，以免造成不可挽回的损失1.7.10客户端版本仅有Alpha版，并且按照作者目前的意向并无再继续开发1.7.10版本的打算如果你打算帮助作者改进该MOD，请自行点击本帖的原帖地址向作者提交bug or 建议

MOD介绍飞天猪、鸡牛（Chickow）、飞天乌贼、鸡箱（Chicken Chest）、恶魂居民（VILLAGER WITHER）....等等等等....令人意想不到的创意组合，尽在Weird Things Mod（好广告的句子= -=）
目前一个纯娱乐向MOD，以后会不会有其他脑洞发展只能拭目以待
MOD截（官方图） 骷髅猪 不断旋转的猪 兔猪一直非常奇怪的猪肥鸡（全身可判定）鸡牛飞天史莱姆曲奇怪兽（已取消）飞天乌贼村民凋零鸡草（草下面是鸡材质）鸡箱
部分合成表（？表示实际未知|未列出的代表未找到可用公式）这一部分还是等待作者给出公式比较好（估计很多是因为作者还没想好怎么设定公式）各种奇葩生物：默认自动生成
鸡箱：（工作台）中间箱子周围羽毛|作者提供，我没试成功=- =
鸡草、鸡土：自动生成？（手撸即可采集）
红宝石矿：自动生成？（需使用木稿及以上等级工具采集）
火矿：自动生成？（需使用木稿及以上等级工具采集）|可用作照明
随机矿：自动生成？（需使用木稿及以上等级工具采集）
下载地址（请尊重作者的劳动成果，尽量使用Baiduyun以外的下载链接）MOD版本号\客户端版本号1.81.7.10Unknow(Reserved)Mediafire|DropboThis version not supportedNew!1.1-BETAMediafire1.0-BETAMediafire0.5-ALPHAThis version not supportedMediafire|Dropbo0.4-ALPHAMediafire|Dropbo0.3-ALPHAMediafire|Dropbo0.2-ALPHAMediafire|Dropbo0.1-ALPHAMediafire|DropboAll Version Form BaiduyunBaiduyun（除非没有任何方式访问以上链接，请不要首选此下载链接）
帖子更新日志2015.07.24 - 更新1.1-BETA版
2015.07.22 - 首次发布
官方更新日志(1.8.X)1.1-BETA:
fixed bug that would cause the game to crash whenever an arrow was shot
+Wild hotDOG's now have no sauce and they get their sauce after taming(the sauce is dyeable just like the wolf's collar)
-removed Invincible Mage
-removed Arrowstorm Skeleton
-removed Cookie Monster
+the hotDOG's ears now move along with the head
+the Flame Hoe no longer crashes your game it summons a 3x3 square of lightning(the lightning is still a bit buggy)
+ item.fin.name is now called "Fire Infused Netherbrick"

(1.8.X)1.0-BETA:
+UPDATED TO 1.8!!!
+Added a brand new texture for the ultra witch
+the Ultra Witch now has an enchantment effect

(1.7.10)0.5-ALPHA:
+Added VILLAGER DRAGON (places an emerald portal on death)
+Added ARMed Creeper
-Removed Ultra Witch
+Added Invincible Mage
+Added CHICKEN BIOME!!!(W.I.P)(it doesn't have any trees or flowers or tallgrass yet, but in the future it will)
+Added Arrowstorm Skeleton
+Added Dirt Golem (1 HP)
+Added Dirt Chicken
+Added Fire Ore(spawns in the nether, drops fire)
+Added Fire Infused Netherbrick(F.I.N)(crafted by putting an nether brick and fire in a crafting table or by smelting an nether brick)
+Added Flame Hoe(Spawn Lightning in a 3x3 block radius, crafted like a normal hoe but with blaze rods instead of sticks and for the material you use Fire Infused Ingots)
+Added Chicken Log

(1.7.10)0.4-ALPHA:
+Added HotDOG
+Added The Villager Spider (TEXTUREPACK COMPATIBLE)
+Added Creeper Chicken(no it is not a green chicken that explodes, ITS WAY MORE AWESOME)
+Added Enderman Chicken(no it is not a black chicken with ender particles that teleports, ITS WAY MORE AWESOME)
+Added COOKIE ORE

(1.7.10)0.3-ALPHA:
+Redadded the Battle Sheep Spawn Egg (its still a work in progress but at least it now looks awesome)
+Added Villager Blaze
+Added Villager Chicken
The Villager Chicken Poops Throwable Emeralds wich just like normal eggs have chance of spawning a baby Villager Chicken
+Added A Spawning System For most Of The Mobs
+Vanilla Villagers Now Attack the Ender Villagers and the Cow-, Pig Villagers
+The Fat Chicken is a lot slower and doesn't float down (its to Heavy :p)
+After a little while the fat chicken drops a lot of raw chickenand it becomes a normal chicken(it loses its FAT :p)

(1.7.10)0.2-ALPHA:
+Added Dutch Language Support(Powered by Me (ik kom uit nederland))
+Added French Language Support(générée par Google Translate)
-Removed some Spawn egg's(TNT Creeper, Weird Spider, Battle Sheep, Slimy Sheep)
Fixed the Villager Ghast
+ Villager Ghast Now shoots Emeralds
+ Chicken Ghast now shoots Eggs
+Squid Ghast now shoots inc sac's
Moved All blocks to the Building Blocks tab
Moved All Dirt Tools to the Vanilla Tools tab
Moved The Dirt Sword and Dirt Armor Set to the vanilla Combat tab
The Throwable Villager is now available in the Miscellaneous tab
Renamed the Giant TNTto Mega TNT
已知Bug（个人测试）1.0-BETA|Forge 11.14.3.1487（1.8）部分方块贴图缺失（Mega TNT）画面中生物数量超过一定量可能会造成客户端假死（一次假死后下次启动进入地图就直接假死）Mega TNT可造成客户端直接崩溃（视显卡性能而定）

备注测试环境（硬件|驱动|软件）Intel Core i5-3230M8GB RAMIntel HD Graphics 4000（*2112MB GRAM|10.18.10.3496）GeForce GT 640M LE（1024MB GRAM|9.18.13.2762）Windows 8.1 x64Java 8 Update 45

搬运授权截图
